name: Turn as Turn
detailsHtml:
“Turn as Turn”, 2022, 3.28mins, Performance Documentary

My body rotated in the opposite direction on the waist-twisting trainer. When the tension reached the unbearable tension of the equipment, I tried to resist the movement to generate tension and forcibly rotated in the opposite direction, but my body still resisted the movement and kept pulling in the other direction.

身體在扭腰訓練器上逆向轉動，當到達器材不能承受的張力時，便試圖抗行産生拉力，強行順向轉動，而我的身體依舊抗行，一直往另一個方向拉扯。
